Articles.Content:
Anyone else encounter a bug where the parts from this mod take on a shiny silver texture? If so is there a known fix?

I forgot to mention this is in 1.11.2

Also a correction, its only a shiny silver(for me at least) in the parts menu of the editors, when put together in the editors and used in flight is a shiny but darker grey.

Edited June 8, 2021 by Nyarlathotep-

I ain't dead. Just been deployed over seas, doing a university course in coding and I've not even fired up KSP for a year. It's a thing.

The only reason for parts to be shiny is because there are configs for TexturesUnlimited. Delete that patch and they should go away.

I really want to get back to this, but it's dependent on erm, everything being easier. In the meantime, I will try and at least do a bug fix for the latest version.
Hello, How do you disable the TU reflections?

Hi would this error be coming from this mod?.

I can remove this mod and retest but it takes forever to load a game

Thanks

EDIT


Does this overwrite stock items or just use them as a template?

 

Edited November 29, 2022 by stk2008

On 11/29/2022 at 5:58 PM, Dioso said:

Hello, How do you disable the TU reflections? 

If you dig around in the mod's files, you should find a patch that applies the TU reflections. Deleting that solves the problem.

Hi, love your mod!

any chance you would update CKAN version (there the most recent version is for KSP 1.3 and here is for 1.8)?
